Bosses.Name: Keeper of Halidom
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - Be prepared to move out of *Inhale. If caught you will take unavoidable damage from the following attack.
- Also be vigilant of the targetted AOE *Moldy Phlegm, prepare to run away.

Tank - Bring the boss to the back wall and make him face away from the party.

Healer - Make sure you *Esuna the *Reduced Immunity & Poison Debuff from the party.

DPS - Do damage & try not to get hit.

Mechanics.Name: Beatdown
Mechanics.Description: Instant frontal melee attack - Small amount of damage.

Mechanics.Name: Moldy Sneeze
Mechanics.Description:
Instant frontal attack - Moderate amount of damage.

*Also inflicts a Healing Debuff (Healing Recieved) to all players hit.

Mechanics.Name: Inhale
Mechanics.Description: Large frontal AOE cone that will pull you into their melee range. Immediately followed up by *Goobbue's Grief.

Mechanics.Name: Goobbue's Grief
Mechanics.Description:
Instant AOE - Moderate amount of damage.

*Also inflicts a Poison Debuff to all that are in melee range.

Mechanics.Name: Moldy Phlegm
Mechanics.Description:
Large AOE attack that targets a random player - Moderate amount of damage.

*Also inflicts a Healing Debuff (Healing Recieved) to all players hit.

Bosses.Name: Giant Bavarois
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - Occasionally, the boss will target a random player, followed by using *Amorphic Flail if allowed to get close. Targetted player should run away from the boss.
- Periodically adds spawn throughout the fight. *Blue Bavarois should be dealt with first, followed by the rest.

Tank - Keep the boss facing away from the party. Also be mindful of the party when adds spawn. When the boss casts *Fire either interrupt or move behind the boss.

Healer - Make sure you *Esuna the debuffs off the party.  *Most detrimental are: Heavy & Paralysis

DPS - Be prepared for add spawns. Priority is: Blue, Purple, White, Green.

Mechanics.Name: Amorphic Flail
Mechanics.Description: Attack - Large amount of damage to the targetted player.

Mechanics.Name: *Periodic add spawns
Mechanics.Description:
White Bavarois: Casts Blizzard spell - Small amount of damage & inflicts the *Heavy debuff.

Blue Bavarois: Casts Water spell - Small amount of damage.

Green Bavarois: Casts Aero spell - Small amount of damage & inflicts the *Windburn debuff.

Purple Bavarois: Casts Thunder spell - Small amount of damage & inflicts the *Paralysis debuff

Bosses.Name: Tonberry King
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - When a Tonberry add dies it gives the boss a stack of *Rancid increasing the damage of *Everybody's Grudge. We want to minimise this. So only kill the small Tonberrys if necessary. Dont attack the larger Tonberry Slashers. Instead, focus on putting the boss down ASAP.

Tank - Keep the boss in the center of the room, facing away from the party. *Always stay in melee range of the boss.

Healer - Make sure you *Esuna the *Heavy debuff from the party. Potential high damage output on the tank/party. Prepare.

DPS - Kill the small Tonberrys when necessary, but dont attack the larger Tonberry Slashers. Instead focus on putting down the boss ASAP.

Mechanics.Name: Lateral Slash
Mechanics.Description: Instant melee attack - Small amount of damage.

Mechanics.Name: Whetstone
Mechanics.Description: Instant ability - Gives the boss the *Sharpened knife buff, increasing the damage that *Lateral slash deals

Scourge of Nym

Ranged attack - Large amount of damage.

Mechanics.Name: Everybody's Grudge
Mechanics.Description: Attack that deals scaling damage based on *Rancor stacks.
